query: { organization(login: "__ORGINIZATION__") { repositories(first: 100, isFork: false, ownerAffiliations: OWNER, orderBy: {direction: DESC, field: CREATED_AT}) { totalCount pageInfo { hasNextPage hasPreviousPage } totalDiskUsage nodes { nameWithOwner isPrivate languages(first: 100, orderBy: {direction: DESC, field: SIZE}) { totalCount edges { node { name } size } } } } } }
